docs.text: Ethan Furman Welcome to my Website! I’m a dual-degree BS/MS student at Haverford College and Bryn Mawr College with a background in physics and a growing focus on ML systems, hardware-aware machine learning, and efficient computation. I'm currently doing research at Bryn Mawr College with the Nanomaterials and Spintronics Group in collaboration wtih the Center for Quantum Materials and Sensing where I work on computational and data-driven aspects of materials research.. Feel free to contact me here .
